meanings.definition: Thin wood shavings used for packing or stuffing.
meanings.sent1: The excelsiors were perfect for cushioning fragile items in the box.
meanings.sent2: I bought a bag of excelsiors to protect the delicate glassware during the move.
meanings.sent3: The excelsiors decided to have a race to see who could stuff the box faster.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a whirlwind of thoughts, like excelsiors scattered in a chaotic storm.
meanings.sent5: The excelsiors whispered secrets to each other as they nestled around the fragile vase.

meanings.definition: A type of wood shaving machine.
meanings.sent1: The excelsiors hummed as they worked tirelessly in the woodshop.
meanings.sent2: The new excelsiors in the factory increased production efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The excelsiors threw a party to celebrate their successful day of shaving wood.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a well-oiled excelsiors machine, always ready to create new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The excelsiors danced in harmony, turning rough wood into smooth perfection.

meanings.definition: A brand name for a type of wood wool.
meanings.sent1: The excelsiors brand was known for its high-quality wood wool products.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using excelsiors wood wool for her crafting projects.
meanings.sent3: The excelsiors wood wool threw a surprise party for the other materials.
meanings.sent4: His words were as soft and comforting as a blanket made of excelsiors wood wool.
meanings.sent5: The excelsiors wood wool whispered tales of the forest to the eager listeners.
